Adventure Guildsman:
Select either Knight's Harmony, Warrior's Harmony, or Wizard's Harmony, and I will give you the buffs below regardless of your selection.
Shared Buffs Horn Melody / Drum Melody / Pipe Organ Melody / Guitar Melody / Harp Melody / Lute Melody / Prevailing Sonata / Daring Sonata / Refreshing Sonata(The 3 Sonatas have the same power as the Sonatas for Adventurers.)
